nodes.documentation:
@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children contracts to implement emergency stop.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @dev called only by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation:
@dev called only by the owner to unpause,
returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

devdoc.details: Base contract which allows children contracts to implement emergency stop.

isOwner(address).details: returns trure is address is the contract Owner.

params._address: - The address of the conntract Owner.

pause().details: called only by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

unpause().details: called only by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
